title: Perma Banned
body:
Hi Guys, think I posted this in the wrong area before.

My account was perma banned for no reason probably 3 or more years ago. I suspect it was one of my mates who kept reporting me for a laugh and this was back when there was rolling account bans going on. I got permanently banned and wasn't able to see why because I forgot the email I had used for my account. Just today I someone was able to recover my account on here by logging in with my credentials and changing my email to one I knew. I am still perma banned but am wondering if there is any way I can be unbanned or at least know the reason why I was. Any help would be much appreciated.

replies.body:
Submit a ticket to player support: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

They'll be able to tell you the details of the punishment, and **if** it was issued in error, *may* be able to reverse it.
